alert.note: Alert for Sun Valley Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 20 at 10:56AM MDT until May 23 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...The Flood Watch is extended for the following rivers in Idaho... Big Wood River near Ketchum affecting Sun Valley Region zone. .Warm temperatures may melt high mountain snowpack and increase river flows. Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm MDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Big Wood River Ketchum 8.0 7.7 Sat 10 am MD 7.8 7.9 7.8 &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/pocatello. IDZ073-212100- /O.EXT.KPIH.FL.A.0004.000000T0000Z-230523T2200Z/ /BWKI1.0.SM.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.OO/ 1056 AM MDT Sat May 20 2023 ...FLOOD WATCH FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Big Wood River near Ketchum. * WHEN...Until Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Lowland flooding from near the SNRA building downriver into Ketchum. Property near Chocolate Gulch Road downstream to Ketchum will have flooding; Sun Peak Picnic Area flooded; Fox Creek Trailhead may be closed * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM MDT Saturday the stage was 7.7 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached based on the latest forecast information. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
